contents:
Yes, definitely too slow and too ignorant to response

Check this latest CBS news report and you can find how disturbing & alarming the situation is in US, especially for we Chinese who have been exposed to the potency of the virus and know how infectious it is
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JLZjUz9ZTn0

1. The test kits are still not ready across the country, although Pence claimed that up to 1 million tests would be conducted till the last weekend

2. The CBS health correspondent recommends a test only if you show symptoms and have visited to the influenced areas, or contacted with the confirmed patients; 
well, it seems that they have little clue about the notoriously long incubation period, which could be over 15 days for nearly 10% of patients
https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.03.06.20032417v1

3. Finally, the use of masks is still not recommended, and even discouraged: related ads are even banned on Google & Facebook
https://www.searchenginejournal.com/google-facebook-ban-ads-for-face-masks-as-coronavirus-spreads/

Additionally, every now and then, you can still notice some stupid (at best ignorant) talk from medical chiefs:

Mar 7, 2020: In Victoria, Australia, the doctor, from the Toorak clinic in Malvern Road consulted approximately 70 patients for five days, between Monday the 2 March and Friday the 6 March. At the same time, state chief health officer Dr. Sutton says at this stage people “can and should go ahead” attending mass gatherings, so long as they don’t have symptoms.
https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2020/mar/06/coronavirus-update-latest-live-news-symptoms-cases-global-infection-rate-uk-usa-australia-italy-china-updates
